about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, Yug Decor Ltd is engaged in trading of Laminates and plywood. Company manufacture different kinds of adhesive – Synthetic Binders, Synthetic Rubber Adhesives, Synthetic Resin Adhesives, Natural Rubber Adhesives, Footwear Adhesives under the brand name of YUG-COL.

It has also positioned its brand name in the domain of Paints and Surface Coatings Distempers, Cement Primers, Emulsions (Interior Paints & Exterior Paints), Wood Finishes for Melamyne in Glossy & Matt Finish and PU Coating in Glossy & Matt Finish, Red-Oxide, Lacquer and Wood Primer under the brand name of YUG-COAT.

In the year 2006, they had buy out manufacturing Unit (Unit I) of Water Based Adhesive and also commence the activity of and Rubber Solution/Adhesive i.e. PVA Based Adhesive, PVA Based Binder, Resin Solution and Rubber Adhesives for wood and footwear industry at Santej. In 2010 it acquired Unit II on lease basis to segregate Rubber solution/adhesive products at this unit from Unit I. Thereafter it added to the basket of manufacturing activity Lai (Starch Based Solution), Surface Coating: Melamyne and Magic Touch, Paints: Distemper, Cement Primer/Wall Primer, Emulsion, Enamel including Automotive Paints.Last year it acquired Unit III on lease to manufacture Paints and finishes.

faqs.question: What is the Yug Decor IPO?
faqs.answer:
Yug Decor IPO is a SME IPO of 1108000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.88 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹26 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on May 18, 2017, and closes on May 23, 2017.

Satellite Corporate Services Private Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Yug Decor IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Yug Decor IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Yug Decor IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Yug Decor IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Yug Decor IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Yug Decor IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Yug Decor IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
